meanings.sent1: The plastic bag was nonabsorbent, so the spilled water stayed on the surface.
meanings.sent2: The nonabsorbent towel just pushed the water around instead of soaking it up.
meanings.sent3: The nonabsorbent sponge felt left out during the water fight.
meanings.sent4: Her nonabsorbent raincoat made her look like a walking umbrella.
meanings.sent5: The nonabsorbent surface repelled the water like a force field.

meanings.definition: A material that does not absorb liquid.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen used nonabsorbent countertops to prevent stains from spills.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician used a nonabsorbent tray to hold the chemicals safely.
meanings.sent3: The nonabsorbent paper towel was useless for cleaning up the spilled juice.
meanings.sent4: The nonabsorbent fabric of the raincoat kept the wearer dry in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The nonabsorbent sponge floated on the water like a tiny boat.
